price: 36. et disaient : « Devons-nous renoncer à nos divinités au profit d’un poète fou ? »
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٖ مَّجۡنُونِۭ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna a-innā latārikū ālihatinā lishāʿirin majnūnin
